General.Name: Wecome Intelligent Manufacturing Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Wecome Intelligent Manufacturing Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of electrical cabinets. The company provides high and low voltage electrical components, medium voltage circuit breakers, gas insulated switchgear, high voltage vacuum circuit breakers, industrial control cabinets, IT and outdoor cabinets, accessories, and other products in China. It also offers gas insulated switchgears, and vacuum circuit breakers, as well as after-sales services. Wecome Intelligent Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Yueqing, China.
General.Address: Wankong Intelligent Manufacturing Building, Yueqing, China, 325603
